{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WLA-S11G |revision= |upc= |ean=4981254661062 |asin= |price= |est_release_date=03/2002 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Intersil |cpu1_model=ISL3856 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT49BV1614T-11TI |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=2 MiB |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L16161A-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3856 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861B |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Agere |eth_chip2_model=LU3X31T2-T64 |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip= |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://buffalo.jp/products/catalog/item/w/wla-s11g/ Product page (JP)] :[http://buffalo.jp/download/manual/w/wlas11g.html Downloads]
[https://secure.flickr.com/photos/14000636@N03/sets/72157623774954319/ '''Flickr''' album w/ internal shots of the device] :"2110702901", "WLA-S11G", some PCB text, and a date code of '''0210''' (March 2002) is silkscreened on the board. ::This a '''Gemtek''' manufactured device. :'''NWN''' Poldhu / ISL3856 (ISL3856CK) based :'''Atmel''' AT49BV1614T-11TI (2MB) Flash, '''ESMT''' M12L16161A-7T (2 MB) RAM
Default settings are per '''Buffalo''''s manual for the device.
==Reviews== *[http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,5528,00.asp On '''PCMag.com''']
